item.title: [EN] SQL Practice : select
item.description: SQL Practices - SELECT Practices set resources are referenced from w3resource.com SQL Exercises, Practice, Solution - Retrieve data from tables SQL Exercises, Practice, Solution - Using Boolean and Relational operators All practice set and answers are written in PostgreSQL Sample Tables salesman salesman_id name city commission 5001 James Hoog New York 0.15 5002 Nail Knite Paris 0.13 5005 Pit Alex London 0.
